attributes.action: 'Let parents know about Mattress Wrapping for Cot Death Prevention which has a 100% success rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'Let parents
know about Mattress Wrapping for cot death prevention which has
a 100% success rate during a 14 year, ongoing campaign run by
Dr T.J Sprott of New Zealand - Parents are entitled to know
that something simple can be done to protect their children
from sudden death'

The Cause of cot death has been discovered and something simple
can be done to prevent it
